links.title: South Korea Says Agreement Made With U.S. on Trade Deal, Tariffs
links.description: South Korea said Sunday it concluded months of discussions with the U.S. on revising the allies' six-year-old bilateral trade deal, and reached an agreement over President Donald Trump's plan to impose tariffs on imported steel.
